member.name: T:D2PacketsVB.RealmServer.RSPacket
member.summary: Base class for Battle.net Client Packets

member.name: F:D2PacketsVB.RealmServer.RealmCharacterActionResult.CharacterOverlap
member.summary: Character already exists or account already has maximum number of characters (currently 8)

member.name: F:D2PacketsVB.RealmServer.RealmCharacterActionResult.InvalidCharacterName
member.summary: Character name is longer than 15 characters or contains illegal characters.

member.name: F:D2PacketsVB.RealmServer.RealmCharacterActionResult.CharacterNotFound
member.summary: Invalid character name specified for action

member.name: F:D2PacketsVB.RealmServer.RealmCharacterActionResult.CharacterDoesNotExist
member.summary: Invalid character name specified for character deletion

member.name: F:D2PacketsVB.RealmServer.RealmCharacterActionResult.Failed
member.summary: The action (logon, upgrade, etc. has failed for an unspecified reason)

member.name: F:D2PacketsVB.RealmServer.RealmCharacterActionResult.CharacterExpired
member.summary: Cannot perform any action but delete on expired characters...

member.name: F:D2PacketsVB.RealmServer.RealmCharacterActionResult.CharacterAlreadyExpansion
member.summary: When trying to upgrade the character

member.name: T:D2PacketsVB.RealmServer.RealmStartupResponse
member.summary: RS Packet 0x01 - Realm Startup - Result of connection start request (RC 0x01)

member.name: T:D2PacketsVB.RealmServer.CharacterCreationResponse
member.summary: RS Packet 0x02 - Character Creation Response - Result of character creation request (reply to RC 0x02)

member.name: T:D2PacketsVB.RealmServer.CreateGameResponse
member.summary: RS Packet 0x03 - Create Game - Reply to join request (RC 0x04)

member.name: T:D2PacketsVB.RealmServer.JoinGameResponse
member.summary: RS Packet 0x04 - Join Game - Reply to join request (RC 0x04)

member.name: T:D2PacketsVB.RealmServer.GameList
member.summary: RS Packet 0x05 - Game List - Availiable game to list (sent once for each game, in reply to RC 0x05)

member.name: T:D2PacketsVB.RealmServer.GameInfo
member.summary: RS Packet 0x06 - Game Info - Provides information about a particular game (reply to RC 0x06)

member.name: T:D2PacketsVB.RealmServer.CharacterLogonResponse
member.summary: RS Packet 0x07 - Character Logon Response - Character log attempt result, sent in reply to RC 0x07

member.name: T:D2PacketsVB.RealmServer.CharacterDeletionResponse
member.summary: RS Packet 0x0A - Character Deletion Response - Result of character deletion, sent in reply to RC 0x0A

member.name: T:D2PacketsVB.RealmServer.MessageOfTheDay
member.summary: RS Packet 0x12 - Message of the Day - Sent after logon in reply to RC 0x12. More like message of the year ^^

member.name: T:D2PacketsVB.RealmServer.GameCreationQueue
member.summary: RS Packet 0x14 - Game Creation Queue - Initinialise waiting queue or update queue position.

member.name: T:D2PacketsVB.RealmServer.CharacterUpgradeResponse
member.summary: RS Packet 0x18 - CharacterUpgradeResult - Character upgrade attempt result, sent in reply to RC 0x18

member.name: T:D2PacketsVB.RealmServer.CharacterList
member.summary: RS Packet 0x19 - Character List - Request a list of characters for the current account (with timestamps)

member.name: T:D2PacketsVB.RealmClient.RCPacket
member.summary: Base class for Battle.net Client Packets

member.name: T:D2PacketsVB.RealmClient.RealmStartupRequest
member.summary: RC Packet 0x01 - Realm Startup Request - Request realm connection startup using the information from Bnet server.

member.name: T:D2PacketsVB.RealmClient.CharacterCreationRequest
member.summary: RC Packet 0x02 - Character Creation Request - Request creation of a new realm character in the current account.

member.name: T:D2PacketsVB.RealmClient.CreateGameRequest
member.summary: RC Packet 0x03 - Create Game Request - Request to join a game - Must be sent after sucessful game creation

member.name: T:D2PacketsVB.RealmClient.JoinGameRequest
member.summary: RC Packet 0x04 - Join Game Request - Request to join a game - Must be sent after sucessful game creation

member.name: T:D2PacketsVB.RealmClient.GameListRequest
member.summary: RC Packet 0x05 - Game List Request - Request a list of availiable games.

member.name: T:D2PacketsVB.RealmClient.GameInfoRequest
member.summary: RC Packet 0x06 - Game Info Request - Request information for a particular game.

member.name: T:D2PacketsVB.RealmClient.CharacterLogonRequest
member.summary: RC Packet 0x07 - Character Logon Request - Requests picking a character (sucess bringing you to lobby...)

member.name: T:D2PacketsVB.RealmClient.CharacterDeletionRequest
member.summary: RC Packet 0x0A - Character Deletion Request - Request deletion of a realm character in the current account.

member.name: T:D2PacketsVB.RealmClient.MessageOfTheDayRequest
member.summary: RC Packet 0x12 - Message Of The Day Request - Sent after logon to request RS 0x12

member.name: T:D2PacketsVB.RealmClient.CancelGameCreation
member.summary: RC Packet 0x13 - Cancel Game Creation - Cancels a currently pending game creation. Note: pressing the cancel button after the game was created and client attempts to join won't trigger this packet.

member.name: T:D2PacketsVB.RealmClient.CharacterUpgradeRequest
member.summary: RC Packet 0x18 - Character Upgrade Request - Requests upgrading a chracter from classic to expansion.

member.name: T:D2PacketsVB.RealmClient.CharacterListRequest
member.summary: RC Packet 0x19 - Character List Request - Request a list of characters for the current account (with timestamps)

member.summary: Base class for Diablo II Packets
